verses.verse: And Jesus <WG2424> being full <WG4134> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> returned <WG5290> from Jordan, <WG2446> and was led <WG71> by the Spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> the wilderness, <WG2048>

Being forty <WG5062> days <WG2250> tempted <WG3985> of the devil. <WG1228> And in those <WG1565> days <WG2250> he did eat <WG5315> nothing: <WG3762> and when they were ended, <WG4931> he afterward <WG5305> hungry. <WG3983>
And the devil <WG1228> said <WG2036> to him, If <WG1487> you be the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> command <WG2036> this <WG5129> stone <WG3037> that it be made <WG1096> bread. <WG740>

And Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> him, saying, <WG3004> It is written, <WG1125> That man <WG444> shall not live <WG2198> by bread <WG740> alone, <WG3441> but by every <WG3956> word <WG4487> of God. <WG2316>

And the devil, <WG1228> taking <WG321> him up into <WG1519> an high <WG5308> mountain, <WG3735> showed <WG1166> to him all <WG3956> the kingdoms <WG932> of the world <WG3625> in a moment <WG4743> of time. <WG5550>

And the devil <WG1228> said <WG2036> to him, All <WG537> this <WG5026> power <WG1849> will I give <WG1325> you, and the glory <WG1391> of them: for that is delivered <WG3860> to me; and to whomsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> I will <WG2309> I give <WG1325> it.
If <WG1437> you therefore <WG3767> will worship <WG4352> <WG1799> me, all <WG3956> shall be yours. <WG4675>

And Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> to him, Get <WG5217> you behind <WG3694> me, Satan: <WG4567> for it is written, <WG1125> You shall worship <WG4352> the Lord <WG2962> your God, <WG2316> and him only <WG3441> shall you serve. <WG3000>

And he brought <WG71> him to Jerusalem, <WG2419> and set <WG2476> him on <WG1909> a pinnacle <WG4419> of the temple, <WG2411> and said <WG2036> to him, If <WG1487> you be the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> cast <WG906> yourself <WG4572> down <WG2736> from hence: <WG1782>
For it is written, <WG1125> He shall give his angels <WG32> charge <WG1781> over <WG4012> you, to keep <WG1314> you:
And in their hands <WG5495> they shall bear <WG142> you up, lest <WG3379> at <WG3379> any <WG3379> time <WG3379> you dash <WG4350> your foot <WG4228> against <WG4314> a stone. <WG3037>
And Jesus <WG2424> answering <WG611> said <WG2036> to him, It is said, <WG2046> You shall not tempt <WG1598> the Lord <WG2962> your God. <WG2316>
And when the devil <WG1228> had ended <WG4931> all <WG3956> the temptation, <WG3986> he departed <WG868> from him for a season. <WG2540>

And Jesus <WG2424> returned <WG5290> in the power <WG1411> of the Spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> Galilee: <WG1056> and there went <WG1831> out a fame <WG5345> of him through <WG2596> all <WG3650> the region <WG4066> round <WG4066> about. <WG4066>
And he taught <WG2258> <WG1321> in their synagogues, <WG4864> being glorified <WG1392> of all. <WG3956>

And he came <WG2064> to Nazareth, <WG3478> where <WG3757> he had been brought <WG5142> up: and, as his custom <WG3588> <WG1486> was, he went <WG1525> into <WG1519> the synagogue <WG4864> on <WG1722> the sabbath <WG4521> day, <WG2250> and stood <WG450> up for to read. <WG314>

And there was delivered <WG1929> to him the book <WG975> of the prophet <WG4396> Esaias. <WG2268> And when he had opened <WG380> the book, <WG975> he found <WG2147> the place <WG5117> where <WG3757> it was written, <WG1125>

The Spirit <WG4151> of the Lord <WG2962> is on me, because <WG3739> <WG1752> he has anointed <WG5548> me to preach <WG2097> the gospel <WG2097> to the poor; <WG4434> he has sent <WG649> me to heal <WG2390> the brokenhearted, <WG4937> <WG2588> to preach <WG2784> deliverance <WG859> to the captives, <WG164> and recovering <WG309> of sight <WG309> to the blind, <WG5185> to set <WG649> at <WG1722> liberty <WG859> them that are bruised, <WG2352>
To preach <WG2784> the acceptable <WG1184> year <WG1763> of the Lord. <WG2962>

And he closed <WG4428> the book, <WG975> and he gave <WG591> it again <WG591> to the minister, <WG5257> and sat <WG2523> down. <WG2523> And the eyes <WG3788> of all <WG3956> them that were in the synagogue <WG4864> were fastened <WG816> on him.
And he began <WG756> to say <WG3004> to them, This <WG4594> day <WG4594> is this <WG3778> scripture <WG1124> fulfilled <WG4137> in your <WG5216> ears. <WG3775>

And all <WG3956> bore <WG3140> him witness, <WG3140> and wondered <WG2296> at <WG1909> the gracious <WG5485> words <WG3056> which <WG3588> proceeded <WG1607> out of his mouth. <WG4750> And they said, <WG3004> Is not this <WG3778> Joseph's <WG2501> son? <WG5207>

And he said <WG2036> to them, You will surely <WG3843> say <WG2046> to me this <WG5026> proverb, <WG3850> Physician, <WG2395> heal <WG2323> yourself: <WG4572> whatever <WG3745> we have heard <WG191> done <WG1096> in Capernaum, <WG2584> do <WG4160> also <WG2532> here <WG5602> in your country. <WG3968>
And he said, <WG2036> Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, No <WG3762> prophet <WG4396> is accepted <WG1184> in his own country. <WG3968>

But I tell <WG3004> you of a truth, <WG225> many <WG4183> widows <WG5503> were in Israel <WG2474> in the days <WG2250> of Elias, <WG2243> when <WG3753> the heaven <WG3772> was shut <WG2808> up three <WG5140> years <WG2094> and six <WG1803> months, <WG3376> when <WG5613> great <WG3173> famine <WG3042> was throughout <WG1909> all <WG3956> the land; <WG1095>
But to none <WG3762> of them was Elias <WG2243> sent, <WG3992> save <WG1508> to Sarepta, <WG4558> a city of Sidon, <WG4605> to a woman <WG1135> that was a widow. <WG5503>

And many <WG4183> lepers <WG3015> were in Israel <WG2474> in the time <WG1909> of Eliseus <WG1666> the prophet; <WG4396> and none <WG3762> of them was cleansed, <WG2511> saving <WG1508> Naaman <WG3497> the Syrian. <WG4948>
And all <WG3956> they in the synagogue, <WG4864> when they heard <WG191> these <WG5023> things, were filled <WG4130> with wrath, <WG2372>

And rose <WG450> up, and thrust <WG1544> him out of the city, <WG4172> and led <WG71> him to the brow <WG3790> of the hill <WG3735> where on <WG1909> <WG3739> their city <WG4172> was built, <WG3618> that they might cast <WG2630> him down <WG2630> headlong. <WG2630>
But he passing <WG1330> through <WG1223> the middle <WG3319> of them went <WG4198> his way,
And came <WG2718> down <WG2718> to Capernaum, <WG2584> a city <WG4172> of Galilee, <WG1056> and taught <WG2258> <WG1321> them on <WG1722> the sabbath <WG4521> days.
And they were astonished <WG1605> at <WG1909> his doctrine: <WG1322> for his word <WG3056> was with power. <WG1849>
And in the synagogue <WG4864> there was a man, <WG444> which had <WG2192> a spirit <WG4151> of an unclean <WG169> devil, <WG1140> and cried <WG349> out with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456>

Saying, <WG3004> Let <WG1439> us alone; <WG1439> what <WG5101> have we to do with you, you Jesus <WG2424> of Nazareth? <WG3478> are you come <WG2064> to destroy <WG622> us? I know <WG1492> you who <WG5101> you are; <WG1488> the Holy <WG40> One of God. <WG2316>

And Jesus <WG2424> rebuked <WG2008> him, saying, <WG3004> Hold <WG5392> your peace, <WG5392> and come <WG1831> out of him. And when the devil <WG1140> had thrown <WG4496> him in the middle, <WG3319> he came <WG1831> out of him, and hurt <WG984> him not.

And they were all <WG3956> amazed, <WG1096> <WG2285> and spoke <WG4814> among <WG4314> themselves, <WG240> saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> a word <WG3056> is this! <WG3778> for with authority <WG1849> and power <WG1411> he commands <WG2004> the unclean <WG169> spirits, <WG4151> and they come <WG1831> out.
And the fame <WG2279> of him went <WG1607> out into <WG1519> every <WG3956> place <WG5117> of the country <WG4066> round <WG4066> about. <WG4066>

And he arose <WG450> out of the synagogue, <WG4864> and entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> Simon's <WG4613> house. <WG3614> And Simon's <WG4613> wife's <WG3994> mother <WG3994> was taken <WG4912> with a great <WG3173> fever; <WG4446> and they sought <WG2065> him for her.
And he stood <WG2186> over <WG1883> her, and rebuked <WG2008> the fever; <WG4446> and it left <WG863> her: and immediately <WG3916> she arose <WG450> and ministered <WG1247> to them.

Now <WG1161> when the sun <WG2246> was setting, <WG1416> all <WG3956> they that had <WG2192> any sick <WG770> with divers <WG4164> diseases <WG3554> brought <WG71> them to him; and he laid <WG2007> his hands <WG5495> on <WG2007> every <WG1538> one <WG1520> of them, and healed <WG2323> them.

And devils <WG1140> also <WG2532> came <WG1831> out of many, <WG4183> crying <WG2896> out, and saying, <WG3004> You are <WG1488> Christ <WG5547> the Son <WG5207> of God. <WG2316> And he rebuking <WG2008> them suffered <WG1439> them not to speak: <WG2980> for they knew that he was Christ. <WG5547>

And when it was day, <WG2250> he departed <WG1831> and went <WG4198> into <WG1519> a desert <WG2048> place: <WG5117> and the people <WG3793> sought <WG2212> him, and came <WG2064> to him, and stayed <WG2722> him, that he should not depart <WG4198> from them.
And he said <WG2036> to them, I must <WG1163> preach <WG2097> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> to other <WG2087> cities <WG4172> also: <WG2532> for therefore <WG1519> <WG5124> am I sent. <WG649>
And he preached <WG2784> in the synagogues <WG4864> of Galilee. <WG1056>
